property.caption: Templategrid name *
property.description: Name of the target templategrid (found in the common tab of the templategrid widget).

property.caption: Microflow name*
property.description: Name of microflow to be executed when templategrid row is selected. The name should begin with the module name e.g myFirstModule.microflow. The microflow should take three input parameters: List of selected templategrid objects, templategrid object(NB: Not a list) and context object.

property.caption: Association name
property.description: Name of association which is used to identify the last selected item. The name should begin with the module name e.g. myFirstModule.associationName
